deliver_gold_block.goal: Craft the required tools, mine and smelt enough gold to craft one gold block, then deliver the gold block to the nearest player.
instructions: 1. Collect at least 8 logs from nearby trees.
2. Craft the logs into wooden planks.
5. Mine stone and collect at least 12 cobblestone.
6. Craft stone tools: stone pickaxe and stone sword.
7. Mine iron ore and collect at least 3 raw iron.
9. Smelt raw iron into iron ingots using the furnace.
10. Craft an iron pickaxe using iron ingots and sticks.
11. Locate a cave or underground area below Y=32.
12. Mine gold ore using the iron pickaxe until at least 9 raw gold is collected.
13. Smelt the raw gold into 9 gold ingots using the furnace.
14. Craft 1 gold block using the 9 gold ingots.
16. Walk to the player and drop the gold block on the ground directly in front of them.
